snippet.title: Stalingrad (Real-Time Strategy) - 2005 Trailer
snippet.description: Stalingrad is a historical military realtime strategy game created by DTF Games. It is based upon one of the pitched battles of World War II, the Battle of Stalingrad. The game is built with the modified version of the engine used in strategy title Blitzkrieg, which was created by Nival Interactive.
